main_definition: The highest in quality, excellence or value.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Superior to all others; of the highest quality or standard.
meanings_and_examples.example: This is the best restaurant I've ever been to.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Most favorable or advantageous among a group.
meanings_and_examples.example: The best decision for me was to study abroad during college.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Highest in degree, rank, value, importance, amount, or number; greatest.
meanings_and_examples.example: She is the best student in her class.
He gave a speech that was truly inspiring and brilliant, making him stand out as one of the best speakers I've heard.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Best in terms of suitability or appropriateness for a particular situation or purpose.
meanings_and_examples.example: For this job role, communication skills are essential. You seem to be the best fit due to your excellent communication abilities.
